function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Collection of personal data such as age, gender, education, and health status increases the risk of privacy breaches.","category":"Privacy risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data integration and data security could lead to compromised access control, potentially risking sensitive information.","category":"Data Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decentralized data pools at personal devices may lead to privacy concerns and unauthorized data access.","category":"Privacy risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to the use of radars, lidars, thermal cameras, and drones for monitoring and surveillance.","category":"Surveillance and Monitoring Privacy Concerns","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data security risks associated with cloud-based surveillance solutions.","category":"Data Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital technologies may result in data privacy and security vulnerabilities.","category":"Privacy risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of shared data between family members through smart home devices may compromise privacy and security, leading to potential misuse of personal information or data breaches.","category":"Privacy risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and data security risks associated with the collection and transmission of sensitive health data from wearables to cloud systems","category":"Data Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks in iot data sharing","category":"Privacy risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data security in iot devices used for
